HELP_DESC: Change interval of autogenerating of messages
PROMPT: Write interval of messages that you want to set for autogeneration in this channel. Allowed arguments:
FIXED: Number from %min% to %max% for fixed interval (in messages)
DISABLED: successfully disabled autogeneration in this channel
SUCCESSFULL: interval of autogenerating messages in this channel successfuly changed to `%interval%`
RANDOM_ENABLED: randomized interval for autogeneration successfully enabled
RANDOM_ALREADY_ENABLED: randomized interval is already enabled for this channel
